title: Job-Related Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Utilizing Mobile Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and intermediate language proficiency
context.additional_context: Enhanced Language Learning Activities Using Digital Devices, Applying Realistic Work Scenarios for Office Workers

learning_goals: Learners can perform work-related language tasks at least twice weekly using mobile digital services.
Learners can improve language expression accuracy by 30% through the feedback system provided by the digital platform.
Learners can achieve an 80% or higher real-time language feedback exchange rate using mobile collaboration tools among peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
